columns.County_Id: A unique identifier for each county in the database.
columns.County_name: The name of the county, representing the geographical area.
columns.Population: The total population residing in the county.
columns.Zip_code: The postal code associated with the county for mailing purposes.

county.table_description: The 'county' table stores information about counties, including unique identifiers, names, populations, and postal codes.

columns.Party_ID: A unique identifier for each political party represented in the dataset.
columns.Year: The year during which the election events related to the party took place.
columns.Party: The name of the political party.
columns.Governor: The name of the candidate for governor representing the party.
columns.Lieutenant_Governor: The name of the candidate for lieutenant governor representing the party.
columns.Comptroller: The name of the candidate for comptroller representing the party.
columns.Attorney_General: The name of the candidate for attorney general representing the party.
columns.US_Senate: The name of the candidate or indication of the absence of an election for the U.S. Senate seat representing the party.

party.table_description: This table contains information about political parties, their candidates for various offices, and the years in which elections were held.

columns.Election_ID: The unique identifier for each election.
columns.Counties_Represented: The identifier(s) for the counties that are represented in this election.
columns.District: The identifier of the electoral district associated with the election.
columns.Delegate: The name(s) of the delegate(s) elected for this district.
columns.Party: The identifier of the political party that the delegate belongs to.
columns.First_Elected: The year in which the delegate was first elected to office.
columns.Committee: The name of the committee that the delegate is a member of.

election.table_description: The election table captures details about various elections, including election identifiers, represented counties, electoral districts, delegates, their associated political parties, the year they were first elected, and the committees they serve on.
